an10.34:1.1: “Katihi nu kho, bhante, dhammehi samannagatena bhikkhuna upasampadetabban”ti?
an10.34:1.2: “Dasahi kho, upali, dhammehi samannagatena bhikkhuna upasampadetabbam.
an10.34:1.4: Idhupali, bhikkhu silava hoti, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati acaragocarasampanno anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu;
an10.34:1.5: bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhamma adikalyana majjhekalyana pariyosanakalyana sattham sabyanjanam kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam abhivadanti, tatharupassa dhamma bahussuta honti dhata vacasa paricita manasanupekkhita ditthiya suppatividdha;
an10.34:1.6: patimokkham kho panassa vittharena svagatam hoti suvibhattam suppavattam suvinicchitam suttaso anubyanjanaso;
an10.34:1.7: patibalo hoti gilanam upatthatum va upatthapetum va;
an10.34:1.8: patibalo hoti anabhiratim vupakasetum va vupakasapetum va;
an10.34:1.9: patibalo hoti uppannam kukkuccam dhammato vinodetum;
an10.34:1.10: patibalo hoti uppannam ditthigatam dhammato vivecetum;
an10.34:1.14: Imehi kho, upali, dasahi dhammehi samannagatena bhikkhuna upasampadetabban”ti.
